document.heading: Residential Property Tax Relief Act of 1977 Application Deadline and Free Clinic Assistance Program Act of 1986 Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 1991

history.narrative: Law 9-53, the “Residential Property Tax Relief Act of 1977 Application Deadline and Free Clinic Assistance Program Act of 1986 Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 1991,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-293. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 11, 1991, and October 1, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 23, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-95 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-53 became effective December 10, 1991.
